thread.title: North Dakota State player accidentally scored on his own basket with a behind-the-back save
thread.title_full: North Dakota State player accidentally scored on his own basket with a behind-the-back save

author: Kofie Yeboah
title: North Dakota State player accidentally scored on his own basket with a behind-the-back save
text:
Life is weird.
Think you’ve seen it all on the basketball court? Think again.
In a game against the Denver Pioneers, North Dakota State Bison guard Khy Kabellis tried to save the ball and ... well.
One of the craziest plays I've ever seen. Unreal! pic.twitter.com/qnKkKADhfO 
— Nate Aamodt (@Naamodt21) February 11, 2017 That’s right. He scored for the other team without looking at the basket. 
North Dakota State still won convincingly with an 81-63 W over Denver, so the school can just look back on this and laugh.
We'll try not to make this a habit. #SCTop10 #NotTop10 pic.twitter.com/IejJQjQw70 
— NDSU Basketball (@NDSUmbb) February 11, 2017 Basketball is weird.
